Activity: Log in to the EHR system. Review any new influenza trend reports from @da-1 and @da-2.
Conduct patient assessments. Pay special attention to any emerging trends in symptoms.
Administer vaccinations. Ensure all documentation is complete and accurate.
Follow up with @rn-1 and @rn-2 to discuss any patient concerns or EHR issues.
Continue patient assessments and vaccinations. Verify all EHR entries.
Prepare a summary of the day's vaccinations and assessments for @clinlead-1.
